attributes.action: Make drivethroughs take write the car/van registration number on the order bags.
attributes.additional_details: The amount of litter and food remains left as litter are food for vermin but also the cooked bones that are left are also dangerous to carnivorous/omnivorousanimals who can't digest cooked bones which splinter and can pierce the gut causing peritonitis.
attributes.background: I would like you to introduce this to help prevent the massive amount of litter left all over the place, which is not only unsightly but dangerous and unhygienic.
